TopicTitle: So That Once Anonymous Building Has Been Identified By Scott Manley

Articles.Content: That building that was located right next to the VAB is apparently called Mission Control. Seems interesting! What are your thoughts on some kind of Mission Control in future?
I just hope they make it so atleast for now, you can click on it and it would bring you to settings.

I am relatively sure that it was already mentioned that this new building is mission control, even before mister manley did his video.

and I actually like the idea of acealeam, it wouldn't be very usefull, since we can simple go to the main menue, but it would be a fun little detail.

I am relatively sure that it was already mentioned that this new building is mission control, even before mister manley did his video.

and I actually like the idea of acealeam, it wouldn't be very usefull, since we can simple go to the main menue, but it would be a fun little detail.

I dunno. I just think it's kind of annoying how you need to exit to the main menu.
It was already revealed that the building was mission control in a dev interview.

Additionally in the KSPTV marathon one of the streams revealed it was mission control, discovered by crashing into it and seeing what they hit.

This is a pretty well known fact at this point.
Plus it is the only missing building needed for a working space center, so I kinda already assumed.
One of the first things in .21 was crash into it to find out its name.
For those who don't recognize its IRL counterpart - the LCC (Launch Control Center) at the real KSC, next to the real VAB
